SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayerUser
public class Player extends Object implements LayerUser
The Model.Player.Player Class contains all the information about the player, and it stores contextual information about the current game that relates individually to players like what cards have been placed, what cards are being held etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(LobbyUser user, ObserverRelay gameObserverRelay)
      Constructs a new Player with the specified user and observer relay. Initializes the player with default values and sets up logging.
      Parameters:
      user - the LobbyUser representing the player
      gameObserverRelay - the ObserverRelay to update game state

    • setPlayerState

      public void setPlayerState(PlayerStates playerState)
      Sets the player's state and updates the observer with the player's new state. If the player is online, it also sends an update to the client's game state.
      Parameters:
      playerState - the new state to set for the player

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner()

    • addSecretObjective

      public void addSecretObjective(Objective selectedObjective)
      Adds a selected objective to the player's list of secret objectives. Updates the observer with the player's updated secret information.
      Parameters:
      selectedObjective - the objective to add to the player's secret objectives

    • incrementRoundsCompleted

      public void incrementRoundsCompleted()

    • addCardHeld

      public void addCardHeld(Card card)
      Transform Card to CardPlayability by adding a boolean which represent if that card is playable on both sides, set as false at the beginning.
      Parameters:
      card - chosen either from the four cards faceUp in the center of the table (a new card is then revealed to replace the one just taken), or the first card from one of the two decks.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int cardIndex, int coordinateIndex, boolean faceUp) throws CoordinateIndexOutOfBounds
      Method calls the place method in this player's CardMap to place the card, and returns the points gained by the player for playing the card.
      Checks if the provided value for faceUp is compatible with the card's playability. If it is then it furthers the request to CardMap.
      Parameters:
      cardIndex -
      coordinateIndex -
      faceUp -
      Throws:
      CoordinateIndexOutOfBounds

    • countAllPoints

      public void countAllPoints(List<Objective> sharedObjectives)
      Method counts all the points a player will score with the shared and secret objectives given their current cardMap.
      Updates both the number of points a player has and the number of individual objectives the player has accomplished.

      Overrides:

    • toSecretPlayer

      public PlayerSecretInfoRecord toSecretPlayer()
      Converts the player's secret information to a transferable data object. This includes the cards held by the player, their playability status, and the first secret objective.
      Returns:
      a PlayerSecretInfoRecord containing the player's secret information
